channel.title: Coder for RSPS since 2001?
channel.description:
Seeing as this is a semi new server starting out ive got several things i would suggest im a coder myself and have been since 2001 i suggest putting your skills in handlers also moving npcs around making your own original new home if you cant i can help with that i also suggest making more training npcs and a better place to train skills like a woodcutting farm and the more logs you turn in the more exp you get kinda like a mini game i mean it would be really nice if you were a little bit more creative umm i can add custom items and things because thats a little more complicated and you could possibly be looking at having to change clients if you wanted custom items i would also suggest some stuff like a few quests
kid said this in my suggestions section, servers have been around since 2001?

item.title: Coder for RSPS since 2001?
item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

[quote=“lesterknome, post:9, topic:337478”]Welcome back coder nade (or whatever your previous accounts name was)[/quote]I’ve been back

Read full topic

item.title: Coder for RSPS since 2001?
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:8, topic:337478”][quote author=JaydenD12 link=topic=433880.msg3185791#msg3185791 date=1271720587]

Seeing as this is a semi new server starting out ive got several things i would suggest im a coder myself and have been since 2001 i suggest putting your skills in handlers also moving npcs around making your own original new home if you cant i can help with that i also suggest making more training npcs and a better place to train skills like a woodcutting farm and the more logs you turn in the more exp you get kinda like a mini game i mean it would be really nice if you were a little bit more creative umm i can add custom items and things because thats a little more complicated and you could possibly be looking at having to change clients if you wanted custom items i would also suggest some stuff like a few quests

kid said this in my suggestions section, servers have been around since 2001?

He didn’t say hes been programming servers since 2001, he said hes been programming since 2001.

It didn’t specifically say a Runescape private server coder though, didn’t think of that did you.
But I doubt it anyway, considering the fact he managed to type out over a hundred word paragraph without using a single bit of punctuation…

What does that have to do with anything? Are you saying all long-term programmers are good at grammar? You never know, English might not even be his first language…
[/quote]

Just my opinion, anyone who can’t use the simplest of punctuation will never get too far in the IT world.[/quote]

True that.

Read full topic

item.title: Coder for RSPS since 2001?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“JaydenD12, post:7, topic:337478”][quote author=Natey link=topic=433880.msg3185759#msg3185759 date=1271717480]

Seeing as this is a semi new server starting out ive got several things i would suggest im a coder myself and have been since 2001 i suggest putting your skills in handlers also moving npcs around making your own original new home if you cant i can help with that i also suggest making more training npcs and a better place to train skills like a woodcutting farm and the more logs you turn in the more exp you get kinda like a mini game i mean it would be really nice if you were a little bit more creative umm i can add custom items and things because thats a little more complicated and you could possibly be looking at having to change clients if you wanted custom items i would also suggest some stuff like a few quests

kid said this in my suggestions section, servers have been around since 2001?
[/quote]

He didn’t say hes been programming servers since 2001, he said hes been programming since 2001.

It didn’t specifically say a Runescape private server coder though, didn’t think of that did you.
But I doubt it anyway, considering the fact he managed to type out over a hundred word paragraph without using a single bit of punctuation…

What does that have to do with anything? Are you saying all long-term programmers are good at grammar? You never know, English might not even be his first language…[/quote]

Just my opinion, anyone who can’t use the simplest of punctuation will never get too far in the IT world.

Read full topic

item.title: Coder for RSPS since 2001?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

It is said here by E V that private servers may have started in early 2002. I find that hard to believe considering RS2 has only been around since 2001.

Although, you may find it useful to get information on RSPS background here.

Read full topic
